Tucson smiles gently to Elita's touch and returns it with a gentile embrace=
 of his own.  He was not aware of it, but his paternal instinct was now beg=
inning to set in.  

" With your father's help, and the assistance of the M=
aximals and Autobots, we're going to teach Hydras a lesson about stealing s=
omething that isn't his to begin with.  We're not about to let him get away=
 with what he did to your mother or to Rodimus and I'll be sure I get my po=
int across to them as well."

He turns his head to Perceptor.

"Perceptor, =
is there a way to establish a com link with Hydras?  I think it's time I ga=
ve him fair warning."

Night Shift re enters the room along with Straight S=
hot.

" Somethn' tells me you're about ta put your foot down, Tucson."

Tuc=
son nodds.

"Yes I am.  Hydras has gone too far and has paid no price for h=
is actions.  Those days are over.  He may think he has won, but this battle=
 has not even started.  And I'm NOT walking away without a fight.  Not this=
 time.  And not ever again.  He's done far too much damage and has even att=
empted to fracture a family, and emotionally harming an innocent child, by =
taking away the ones she loves the most.  That is my final straw."

Straigh=
t Shot looks up to him.

" With a name like yours, it was bound ta come ta =
this sooner or later.  You didn't get that name for nothing.  Even when you=
 weren't a Prime, you were still as tough as nails, even if you weren't the=
 largest Autobot on the team.  Rodimus is lucky ta have ya fighting beside =
him as a Prime.  Now with the two of you putting your feet down, you'll hav=
e him running in the opposite direction with his tail between his legs, lit=
erally. And Rodimus, now that I think of it, As I do for Tucson, my weapon =
alt modes will also work for you in the event that Tucson is unfit to wield=
 me."

Tucson nodds.

"She's right.  If anything happens to me, you are the=
 one chosen to wield Straight Shot.  She will not let you down, her aim is =
impecable, and she never misses her target.  My trust in you is infinate, a=
nd I know you will wield her well."
